name: Operation Zombie Killerz
description:
Welcome To Operation Zombie Killerz, My First Ever Game Project !

Current Version: Alpha 0.1

Join me on my path to make the best game possible as i learn new things about game development. Watch as OPZ grows bigger and better over time.

So what is Operation Zombie Killerz ?

Well its a FPS zombie survival game but with a twist. You are a state of the art prototype robot with only one goal... Destroy Zombies On Sight. Survive endless hordes of zombies as you get better gear and items.

As you slay the dead they may drop you a "Cache". These come in three rarity's Rare,Legendary And Mythic. Rare weapons have only 1 weapon perk for e.g: Increased fire rate. 

Legendary weapons have 2 weapon perks and have increased damage & ammo reserves than there rare versions. 

Mythic weapons are totally unique. They have their own custom perks and looks. For e.g: Celeste: A mythic rocket launcher that shoots a volley of stars that supernova on impact decimating anything in their path ! 

Now lets talk about Blessings:

There are currently 3 Blessings in the game. "Valor" increases melee damage by 300%. "Windfall" increases sprint speed by 20% and finally "Strength" Increases equip limit from 2 to 4.

Now the juicy stuff... Weapons:

Currently there are around 18-20 Weapons which each have at least 5 rare variants and at least 4 legendary variants per weapon.

Easter Eggs: As of version 0.1 there is only 1 easter egg in the game which is a music easter egg hidden in the first map "God Complex" can you find it ?

Lastly i just want to thank you for even considering trying my little game. Its far from prefect and im still learning so much. But i thought it would be cool to upload it here and let you see how the game evolves as i grow as a developer. 

Thank you for reading, and go slay some zombies !

- Shaun
